price: (30) Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
